ja472:13.2: gambhīre ca suduttare → gambhīre ca duruttare (s2, s3) | gambhīre suduruttare (pts1, mr)
ja472:16.4: attanaṃ → attanā (s2, s3) | attani (pts1, mr) evaṃ ahampi puna sotthibhāvappattaṃ gilitabaḷisaṃ purisamiva attānaṃ passāmīti (aṭṭha. saṃvaṇṇanā)
ja472:19.5: Rājaputto ahaṃ āsiṃ → ahaṃ tadā rājaputto (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
